title: Mariah
description: Mariah is a fully illustrated tale of a young girl who finds a tiny Mermaid hidden within a shell.Discover the value of friendship and wonder along with them as they share a summer together.As a special feature there are included patterns in the book to make your very own Mariah Mermaid Doll. The doll is either knit or sewn using the complete, easy to follow instructions.
author: Dona Carruth
